video.description:
Light Study 001 - vimeo.com/181874657
Light Study 002 - vimeo.com/192058685
Light Study 003 - vimeo.com/197829455
Light Study 004 - vimeo.com/197834578

Recorded in Detroit, MI.

"Greece is a good place
to look at the moon, isn't it
You can read by moonlight
You can read on the terrace
You can see a face
as you saw it when you were young
There was good light then
oil lamps and candles 
and those little flames
that floated on a cork in olive oil
What I loved in my old life
I haven't forgotten
It lives in my spine
Marianne and the child
The days of kindness
It rises in my spine
and it manifests as tears
I pray that loving memory
exists for them too
the precious ones I overthrew
for an education in the world"
video.title: "DAYS OF KINDNESS" | Leonard Cohen
video.html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/192058685" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" title=""DAYS OF KINDNESS" | Leonard Cohen" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
